AbortAndRollbackChangeOrder.title: AbortAndRollbackChangeOrder
AbortAndRollbackChangeOrder.summary: Terminates a change order and rolls back the corresponding application.

BatchStartApplications.title: BatchStartApplications
BatchStartApplications.summary: Starts multiple applications at a time.

BatchStopApplications.title: BatchStopApplications
BatchStopApplications.summary: Stops multiple applications at a time.

BindSlb.title: BindSlb
BindSlb.summary: Associates a Server Load Balancer (SLB) instance with an application.

ConfirmPipelineBatch.title: ConfirmPipelineBatch
ConfirmPipelineBatch.summary: Checks whether to start the next batch.

CreateApplicationScalingRule.title: CreateApplicationScalingRule
CreateApplicationScalingRule.summary: Creates an auto scaling policy for an application.

CreateConfigMap.title: CreateConfigMap
CreateConfigMap.summary: Create a ConfigMap in a namespace.

CreateGreyTagRoute.title: CreateGreyTagRoute
CreateGreyTagRoute.summary: Creates a canary release rule for a Spring Cloud or Dubbo application.

DeleteApplicationScalingRule.title: DeleteApplicationScalingRule
DeleteApplicationScalingRule.summary: Deletes an auto scaling policy for an application.

DeleteGreyTagRoute.title: DeleteGreyTagRoute
DeleteGreyTagRoute.summary: Deletes a canary release rule based on the specified rule ID.

DescribeAppServiceDetail.title: DescribeAppServiceDetail
DescribeAppServiceDetail.summary: Queries the metadata details of the service of an application.

DescribeApplicationConfig.title: DescribeApplicationConfig
DescribeApplicationConfig.summary: Queries the configurations of an application.

DescribeApplicationGroups.title: DescribeApplicationGroups
DescribeApplicationGroups.summary: Queries the instance groups of an application.

DescribeApplicationImage.title: DescribeApplicationImage
DescribeApplicationImage.summary: Queries the information about the image of an application.

DescribeApplicationInstances.title: DescribeApplicationInstances
DescribeApplicationInstances.summary: Queries a list of application instances.

DescribeApplicationScalingRule.title: DescribeApplicationScalingRule
DescribeApplicationScalingRule.summary: Queries an auto scaling policy of an application.

DescribeApplicationScalingRules.title: DescribeApplicationScalingRules
DescribeApplicationScalingRules.summary: Queries the auto scaling policies of an application.

DescribeApplicationSlbs.title: DescribeApplicationSlbs
DescribeApplicationSlbs.summary: Queries the information about the SLB instances that are associated with an application.

DescribeApplicationStatus.title: DescribeApplicationStatus
DescribeApplicationStatus.summary: Queries the status of an application.

DescribeChangeOrder.title: DescribeChangeOrder
DescribeChangeOrder.summary: Queries the information of a change order.

DescribeComponents.title: DescribeComponents
DescribeComponents.summary: Queries the version of the component that is required when you create and deploy an application.

DescribeConfigMap.title: DescribeConfigMap
DescribeConfigMap.summary: Queries the details of a ConfigMap.

DescribeEdasContainers.title: DescribeEdasContainers
DescribeEdasContainers.summary: Queries the container components of a microservices application.

DescribeGreyTagRoute.title: DescribeGreyTagRoute
DescribeGreyTagRoute.summary: Queries the details of a canary release rule based on the specified rule ID.

DescribeIngress.summary: Queries the configurations of a routing rule.

DescribeInstanceLog.title: DescribeInstanceLog
DescribeInstanceLog.summary: Queries the log of an instance.

DescribeJob.title: DescribeJob
DescribeJob.summary: Queries the configurations of a job template.

DescribeJobStatus.title: DescribeJobStatus
DescribeJobStatus.summary: Queries the status of a job.

DescribeNamespace.title: DescribeNamespace
DescribeNamespace.summary:
Indicates whether the information of the namespace was queried successfully. Valid values:

\*   \*\*true\*\*: indicates that the query was successful.
\*   \*\*false\*\*: indicates that the query failed.

DescribeNamespaceResources.title: DescribeNamespaceResources
DescribeNamespaceResources.summary: Queries the information of the resources in a namespace.

DescribePipeline.title: DescribePipeline
DescribePipeline.summary: Queries the information of a batch.

DescribeSecret.title: DescribeSecret
DescribeSecret.summary: Queries the details of a Secret instance.

DisableApplicationScalingRule.title: DisableApplicationScalingRule
DisableApplicationScalingRule.summary: Disables an auto scaling policy for an application.

EnableApplicationScalingRule.title: EnableApplicationScalingRule
EnableApplicationScalingRule.summary: Enables an auto scaling policy for an application.

GetArmsTopNMetric.title: GetArmsTopNMetric
GetArmsTopNMetric.summary: Queries the top N applications in Application Monitoring.

GetAvailabilityMetric.title: GetAvailabilityMetric
GetAvailabilityMetric.summary: Queries the top N applications in which abnormal instances exist. The applications are sorted by the total number of abnormal instances.

GetChangeOrderMetric.title: GetChangeOrderMetric
GetChangeOrderMetric.summary: Queries the top N applications in which abnormal change orders exist. The applications are sorted by a specific field.

GetScaleAppMetric.title: GetScaleAppMetric
GetScaleAppMetric.summary: Queries the top N applications in which auto scaling takes effect.

GetWarningEventMetric.title: GetWarningEventMetric
GetWarningEventMetric.summary: Queries the top N applications in which Warning events occur.

ListAppEvents.title: ListAppEvents
ListAppEvents.summary: Queries the events that occurred in an application.

ListAppServicesPage.title: ListAppServicesPage
ListAppServicesPage.summary: Queries the services of an application.

ListAppVersions.title: ListAppVersions
ListAppVersions.summary: Queries the historical versions of an application.

ListChangeOrders.title: ListChangeOrders
ListChangeOrders.summary: Queries a list of change orders.

ListConsumedServices.title: ListConsumedServices
ListConsumedServices.summary: Queries a list of microservices that are subscribed.

ListGreyTagRoute.title: ListGreyTagRoute
ListGreyTagRoute.summary: Queries the details of a canary release rule based on an application ID.

ListJobs.title: ListJobs
ListJobs.summary: Queries the information about job templates.

ListLogConfigs.title: ListLogConfigs
ListLogConfigs.summary: Queries the logging configurations of an application.

ListNamespaceChangeOrders.title: ListNamespaceChangeOrders
ListNamespaceChangeOrders.summary: Queries a list of change orders in a namespace.

ListNamespacedConfigMaps.title: ListNamespacedConfigMaps
ListNamespacedConfigMaps.summary: Queries a list of ConfigMaps in a namespace.

ListPublishedServices.title: ListPublishedServices
ListPublishedServices.summary: Queries a list of microservices that are published.

ListSecrets.title: ListSecrets
ListSecrets.summary: Queries the information about Secrets in a namespace.

ListTagResources.title: ListTagResources
ListTagResources.summary: Queries the mapping relationships between applications and tags.

OpenSaeService.title: OpenSaeService
OpenSaeService.summary: Activates Serverless App Engine (SAE) for free.

QueryResourceStatics.title: QueryResourceStatics
QueryResourceStatics.summary: Queries the resource usage of an application.

ReduceApplicationCapacityByInstanceIds.title: ReduceApplicationCapacityByInstanceIds
ReduceApplicationCapacityByInstanceIds.summary: Scales in an application based on instance IDs.

RescaleApplicationVertically.title: RescaleApplicationVertically
RescaleApplicationVertically.summary: Changes the instance specifications of an application.

RestartInstances.title: RestartInstances
RestartInstances.summary: Restarts one or more instances in an application.

UnbindSlb.title: UnbindSlb
UnbindSlb.summary: Disassociates an internal-facing or Internet-facing SLB instance from an application.

UpdateAppSecurityGroup.title: UpdateAppSecurityGroup
UpdateAppSecurityGroup.summary: Updates the security group of an application.

UpdateApplicationDescription.title: UpdateApplicationDescription
UpdateApplicationDescription.summary: Updates the description of an application.

UpdateApplicationScalingRule.title: UpdateApplicationScalingRule
UpdateApplicationScalingRule.summary: Updates an auto scaling policy for an application.

UpdateIngress.title: UpdateIngress
UpdateIngress.summary: Updates the configurations of a routing rule.

UpdateNamespace.title: UpdateNamespace
UpdateNamespace.summary: Updates the information about a namespace.

UpdateNamespaceVpc.title: UpdateNamespaceVpc
UpdateNamespaceVpc.summary: Updates the virtual private cloud (VPC) that is bound to a namespace.

UpdateSecret.title: UpdateSecret
UpdateSecret.summary:
The HTTP status code. Valid values:

\*   \*\*2xx\*\*: The call was successful.
\*   \*\*3xx\*\*: The call was redirected.
\*   \*\*4xx\*\*: The call failed.
\*   \*\*5xx\*\*: A server error occurred.
